title: Collaborative Learning-Based Simulation Teaching Method Design for Vocational School Chemistry Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic chemistry concepts and possession of industrial field experience
context.additional_context: Learning through VR simulation that replicates real-world chemical process problems in industrial settings.

learning_goals: Learners can employ collaborative learning strategies to solve chemistry problems required in vocational environments.
Learners analyze chemical processes in industrial settings and apply safety protocols through VR simulations.
Learners derive at least three improvement points in the chemical problem-solving process through peer evaluation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
